name: test_book_crud_e2e
description:
End-to-end scenario that covers the full lifecycle of a book: 
creation, retrieval, update, and deletion.
descriptionHtml:
End-to-end scenario that covers the full lifecycle of a book:
creation, retrieval, update, and deletion.

testStage.description:
End-to-end scenario that covers the full lifecycle of a book: 
creation, retrieval, update, and deletion.

steps.name: Read the created book by id
Confirm update via GET by id
Delete the book and validate it is gone

labels.name: story
labels.value: US-1 User can create, read, update, and delete a book
